name: SEA SCOOTER
notes:
First called the SEA SCOUTER and designed for use by the Sea Scouts in Seattle,WA (USA)
Molded interior seats (>hull # 2800) increased the hull weight to 190 lbs.(SEA SCOOTER)
An optional 25 sq. ft. jib and 55 sq. ft. spinnaker were also available.
Thanks to 'Christine' for providing information and brochure.
